description: Given a Monday.com item_id or item_ids, fetches the Updates (email) section for those items and extracts all PO numbers from the 'Purchase Order Number' column of any table in the update body.

capabilities.name: extract_c3_po_numbers
capabilities.description: Fetches the Updates (email body) for the given item_id(s), parses any table that has a 'Purchase Order Number' column, and returns all PO numbers per item. Accepts item_id (single) or item_ids (array).

item_id.description: Single Monday.com item (pulse) ID. Use this or item_ids.

item_ids.description: Multiple Monday.com item (pulse) IDs for batch results.

api_token.description: Monday.com API token. If omitted, MONDAY_API_TOKEN environment variable is used.

author: neehar
